title: Mini-Ep 44: Phone Addiction and Career Transitions
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 44: Phone Addiction and Career Transitions
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate lend advice to a listener who’s stressed about their fiancé leaving for a lengthy work trip, and give some tips to a caller who wants to limit their screen time. Plus, they receive an email defending Good & Plenty candies, and discus...
description:
Doree and Kate lend advice to a listener who’s stressed about their fiancé leaving for a lengthy work trip, and give some tips to a caller who wants to limit their screen time. Plus, they receive an email defending Good & Plenty candies, and discuss self-care during career transitions.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Daily Harvest - To get 3 cups free in your first box visit daily-harvest.com and enter promo code forever35.
  • Beauty By Design - First time customers get 20% off! Visit beautybydesign.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
